member.name: T:AStar.Api.HealthChecks.HealthCheckExtensions
member.summary: The class contains the relevant method(s) to configure the endpoints.

member.summary: The method will add a basic health/live and health/ready endpoint.
member.returns: The original to facilitate further method chaining.

member.name: T:AStar.Api.HealthChecks.HealthCheckResponses
